addVoter(uint256,uint256).details: Adds a voter to a poll.

params.identityCommitment: : Identity commitment of the group member.

castVote(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Casts an anonymous vote in a poll.

createPoll(uint256,address,uint256).details: Creates a poll and the associated Merkle tree/group.

endPoll(uint256,uint256).details: Ends a pull and publishes the key to decrypt the votes.

startPoll(uint256,uint256).details: Starts a pull and publishes the key to encrypt the votes.
